title: How do I enable the display to rotate while watching videos?
answer:
Use either of the following methods: 

1. Flick down from the notification bar to display the notification panel. Then touch the shortcut switch for auto-rotate screen to enable or disable it.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150501091451770001.png)  

2. On the home screen, touch Settings > Accessibility, and select or clear the Auto-rotate screen check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150501091439778001.png)
